game.name: Surreality Check
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A absurdist, psychological choose your own adventure, Surreality check has the player helping Rowan Roach discover the meaning of his life through therapy sessions with the Universe personified. The Universe being a massive tool doesn't help matters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A absurdist, psychological choose your own adventure, Surreality check has the player helping Rowan Roach discover the meaning of his life through therapy sessions with the Universe personified. The Universe being a massive tool doesn't help matters.
